programme.title: El transportador
programme.desc: El exmilitar Frank Martin vive lo que parece ser una vida tranquila, prestando sus servicios como transportador, pero cuando rompe las tres reglas de conducta por las que se rige, la violencia vuelve a adueñarse de su vida.

programme.title: El transportador 2

programme.title: Logan

programme.title: Un novato en apuros 2
programme.desc: El policía novato Ben Barber desea volverse detective, lo mismo que James Payton, su futuro cuñado. Reacio, James lleva a Ben a Miami en busca de pistas sobre un cartel de drogas. Durante a la investigación, ellos encuentran evidencias que implican a un respetado empresario. Les toca a ellos probar que el ejecutivo carismático, Antonio Papa, es un violento capo que comanda el tráfico de drogas en el sur de Florida.

programme.title: El niño y el fugitivo
programme.desc: En una isla del río Misisipi, dos jóvenes amigos se encuentran con Mud, un fugitivo cuyas historias salvajes acerca de una mujer hermosa, el asesinato de un hombre en Texas y su persecución por parte de un cazarrecompensas se hacen realidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Se desata una tormenta de nieve terrible que sorprende al grupo de Ezekiel viajando hacia Hilltop. Su única esperanza reside en cruzar la frontera que estableció Alpha y acortar el trayecto a través del territorio que tienen prohibido pisar.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En Oceanside, un grupo continúa entrenando en caso de que los Susurradores regresen. Las tensiones aumentan mientras los héroes lidian para aferrarse a su concepto de civilización.

programme.desc: Se revela el origen de Alpha y Beta. Además, Alpha intenta endurecer a Lydia a medida que se preparan para caminar junto a los muertos, y los Susurradores crean sus hordas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: La creciente amenaza del regreso de los Susurradores dispara la paranoia en Alexandría. Además, Carol lucha contra su sed de venganza.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los habitantes de Alexandría están paranoicos y enloquecidos con los Susurradores. Además, de regreso en la Colonia Hilltop, un grupo lidia con un inesperado problema de seguridad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Desaparecen provisiones de Hilltop. Además, un habitante de Alexandría idolatra a Negan. Ezekiel guarda un secreto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol y Daryl emprenden una misión juntos. Mientras tanto, Siddiq intenta resolver un misterio.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol provoca que Daryl se sienta absolutamente incómodo. Alpha y Beta tienen dudas sobre una persona.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Una pelea causa tensiones en Oceanside mientras los habitantes de Alejandría se embarcan en una misión de alto riesgo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo debe averiguar cómo salir de una situación peligrosa.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo debe defender a Alexandria de una fuerza amenazante.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras el encuentro de Daryl y Lydia con Alpha, los habitantes de las comunidades enfrentadas a los Susurradores, que se aproximan a la Cumbre, tienen dos opciones: huir o pelear. Entretanto, surgen problemas entre Eugene y Stephanie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Michonne devuelve a Virgil a la isla misteriosa de la que proviene para que se reencuentre con su familia. A cambio, Virgil promete que le entregará un arsenal que cambiará el rumbo de la guerra contra los Susurradores.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Michonne lleva a Virgil de regreso a su misteriosa isla para reunirse con su familia. A cambio, Virgil promete armas que podrían cambiar el rumbo de la Guerra de los Susurradores.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Todos, héroes y villanos, se adaptan a las consecuencias del devastador incendio que destruyó la comunidad. Eugene encabeza a un grupo que parte en busca de Stephanie, guiados por la esperanza de encontrar otra civilización.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Princess asusta a los caballos de Eugene, Yumiko y Ezekiel, pero les promete otro medio de transporte. Mientras, Beta, en estado de delirio psicótico, guía a la horda de zombis hacia Alexandria para destruirlo todo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los seguidores de Beta se acercan a las puertas, y parte del grupo se impregna de sangre de zombi para intentar escapar entre la multitud de caminantes y regresar con ayuda. Sin embargo, los susurradores se mueven con cuchillos entre los zombis.

programme.title: Harlots
programme.desc: El pasado atormenta a Elizabeth y Lucy podría ser quien sufra las consecuencias. Además, la ira de Hal contra la familia Wells aumenta.

programme.title: Harlots
programme.desc: Cuando Blayne garantiza su poder, Lydia se enfrenta a una terrible decisión. Además, el enfrentamiento entre Wells y Pincher alcanza un punto crítico, y Nancy parece ser el principal objetivo de Hal. ¿Qué estará dispuesto a hacer por venganza?

programme.title: La desaparición
programme.desc: La tensión entre Luke y Henry aumenta cuando Anthony se mete en problemas en la escuela. Por otro lado, Anthony desaparece y Luke y Helen se asustan muchísimo.

programme.title: La desaparición
programme.desc: Dos años después, aparecen testigos que afirman haber visto a Anthony. Además, Henry está obsesionado con la hoja de Paulownia Tomentosa. Por otro lado, Susan y Charles descubren algo en el parque.

programme.title: Aquí en la Tierra
programme.desc: Un atentado sacude la realidad política mexicana y la vida de Roca. Adán intenta establecer las responsabilidades de los rebeldes de San Mateo. La necesidad de Carlos va demasiado lejos y termina involucrado en una lucha que puede costar su libertad.

programme.title: Aquí en la Tierra
programme.desc: Mientras Rocha intenta evitar ser arrestado, una duda siniestra se apodera de Carlos. Adam se enfrenta a los líderes de San Mateo de nuevo para exigirles que tengan sentido común.

programme.title: Sitiados: México
programme.desc: Damián consigue nuevos socios para enfrentar a Lorenzo y reclamar la ciudad. Tonahuac y Tania se unen para rescatar a Chicahua.

programme.title: Programación especial
programme.desc: Segmento especial de programación.

programme.title: Atlanta
programme.desc: Las celebridades se presentan para los chicos; Paper Boi no es un fan.

programme.title: Atlanta
programme.desc: Van está celoso y se diluye la delgada línea entre el amor y el odio.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: La familia y los amigos de Kyle están de luto por las consecuencias del desastre, hasta que una revelación del reverendo Anderson los obliga a usar los poderes.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle trata de mantener a su familia a salvo, mientras la ciudad de Roma es invadida por los poseídos.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle se enfrenta a los misterios de sus poderes. El reverendo Anderson enfrenta a Sidney, mientras los planes del Dr. Park crecen.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle y Anderson enfrentan a Sidney, hasta que una amenaza interviene. Megan deja la seguridad del bosque de la iglesia y el peligro la encuentra. La tragedia golpea a la familia de Giles. Un extraño desconocido atrae la atención de Kyle.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle, de mal humor, une fuerzas con un desconocido en un intento de acabar con la posesión, pero teme que él esté ocultando algo. Megan lucha contra sus captores. El reverendo comparte una inesperada fuente de poder con el jefe Giles.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick Grimes, policía de una pequeña localidad de Georgia, despierta de un coma y repentinamente se encuentra en un mundo apocalíptico. Desorientado, en busca de su familia y una explicación a lo acontecido, Rick ha de adaptarse al nuevo orden.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick llega a caballo a Atlanta, donde encuentra una ciudad desolada. Tras escapar de una situación de peligro, Rick se une a un grupo de supervivientes en unos grandes almacenes, donde le espera un enemigo más peligroso que los zombis.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick regresa a Atlanta al sentirse culpable de haber dejado a Merle abandonado en un edificio asolado por zombis. En el campamento, la inesperada llegada de Rick causa tensión entre Lori y Shane, quien había asegurado que Rick había muerto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: En Atlanta, una banda armada sorprende al grupo de Rick mientras están buscando a Merle. Entretanto, en el campamento, Jim empieza a comportarse de forma extraña, tiene premoniciones y asusta a los niños con una tragedia que se aproxima.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras el ataque al campamento, Rick conduce al grupo hacia el CDC, un recinto de la base sanitaria militar, en el que esperan encontrar un refugio seguro. Durante el trayecto, Jim debe tomar una decisión extremadamente difícil.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Un científico inquietante deja entrar a Rick y su grupo en el CDC. No obstante, hay algo extraño y los supervivientes del apocalipsis zombi empiezan a sospechar que no todo es lo que parece en el recinto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo, liderado por Rick, se topa con una horda de zombis en mitad de la autopista. La pequeña Sophia, asustada, huye sola al bosque y todos tratarán de encontrarla antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick encuentra una granja en la que buscar ayuda para salvar la vida de su hijo, quien recibió el impacto accidental de una bala. Después, Shane entra en una escuela llena de zombis para llevarse material sanitario junto al tipo que disparó a Carl.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane y Otis están atrapados por los zombis en la escuela adonde acudieron por el material sanitario necesario para operar a Carl. En la granja, surgen las primeras tensiones y Daryl y Andrea vuelven a salir en busca de Sophie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane regresa a la granja con las medicinas, pero el sacrificio que he tenido que cometer no es bien visto por el resto del grupo. En la granja, el grupo intenta sacar a un zombi del pozo de agua fresca antes de que la infecte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras busca a Sophia, Daryl sufre un accidente que lo deja perdido y herido en el bosque. La tensión entre el grupo y los propietarios de la granja aumenta, así como la inestabilidad del propio grupo, debido a que Shane desafía a Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras descubrir que la familia mantiene encerrada a sus familiares convertidos en zombis en el granero, Dale confronta a Hershel. Lori, por su parte, confiesa a Rick que está embarazada y los problemas entre los integrantes del grupo se intensifican.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn le revela a todo el grupo el secreto del granero, pero no están de acuerdo sobre cómo actuar: Rick ordena respetar la autoridad de Hershel, aunque Shane quiere acabar con los zombis. Por otra parte, descubren por fin qué le ha pasado a Sophia.

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: John Tunstall (Terence Stamp), a distinguished British gentleman, employs downtrodden youths to tend his herd on the New Mexican frontier. When Tunstall is gunned down by the crooked Lawrence G. Murphy (Jack Palance), a ragtag group of cow hands -- including Doc Scurlock (Kiefer Sutherland), Richard Brewer (Charlie Sheen) and young William "Billy the Kid" Bonney (Emilio Estevez) -- ride forth in search of bloody vengeance for the death of their beloved mentor.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Crockett resents Castillo's attack on his mentor (Jack Kehoe) investigating thefts in wealthy neighborhoods; guest Esai Morales.

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: A football-team owner injures a woman in a hit-and-run accident.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In need of a vacation from his ordinary life, factory worker Douglas Quaid (Colin Farrell) visits Rekall, a company that can turn dreams into real memories. Thinking that memories of life as a superspy are just the ticket, Quaid undergoes the procedure -- but it goes horribly wrong. Suddenly, Quaid is a hunted man. He teams up with a rebel fighter (Jessica Biel) on a search to find the head of the underground resistance and take down the leader (Bryan Cranston) of the free world.

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: Fighting his way north to free himself and his family, outlaw slave Shields "Emperor" Green joins forces with abolitionist John Brown for a daring raid in Harpers Ferry, W.Va., in 1859.

programme.title: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: His faith broken by many years fighting in the Crusades, a knight named Behman (Nicolas Cage) returns to Europe and finds it ravaged by the Black Plague. A dying cardinal orders Behman and his friend, Felson (Ron Perlman), to take an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will destroy her powers and end the pestilence. As Behman and five comrades undertake the dangerous journey, they come to realize that the prisoner is no ordinary girl, and evil forces await at the destination.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Crockett resents Castillo's attack on his mentor (Jack Kehoe) investigating thefts in wealthy neighborhoods; guest Esai Morales.

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: A rookie policewoman in New Orleans inadvertently captures the shooting death of a young drug dealer on her body cam. After realizing the murder was committed by corrupt cops, she teams up with the only person from the community who's willing to help her. Now, she finds herself on the run from both the vengeful criminals and the lawmen who desperately want to destroy the incriminating footage.

programme.title: Red Sonja
programme.desc: Power-hungry Queen Gedren (Sandahl Bergman) captures the priestesses guarding the Talisman, a mystical orb that created and can destroy the world. But one of the priestesses escapes and seeks out her warrior sister, Red Sonja (Brigitte Nielsen), to warn her about Gedren's plan for world domination. Lord Kalidor (Arnold Schwarzenegger), the Talisman's keeper, insists on helping Sonja, and though she scorns the assistance of any man, she soon gains respect for Kalidor's fighting prowess.

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: A world of the very near future in which cattle, fish and even family pet can be cloned. But cloning humans is illegal -- that is until family man Adam Gibson comes home from work one day to find a clone has replaced him. Taken from his family and plunged into a sinister world he doesn't understand, Gibson must not only save himself from the assassins who must now destroy him to protect their secret, but uncover who and what is behind the horrible things happening to him.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect
programme.desc: Medical researcher Frank (Mark Duplass), his fiancee Zoe (Olivia Wilde) and their team have achieved the impossible: they have found a way to revive the dead. After a successful, but unsanctioned, experiment on a lifeless animal, they are ready to make their work public. However, when their dean learns what they've done, he shuts them down. Zoe is killed during an attempt to recreate the experiment, leading Frank to test the process on her. Zoe is revived -- but something evil is within her.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In need of a vacation from his ordinary life, factory worker Douglas Quaid (Colin Farrell) visits Rekall, a company that can turn dreams into real memories. Thinking that memories of life as a superspy are just the ticket, Quaid undergoes the procedure -- but it goes horribly wrong. Suddenly, Quaid is a hunted man. He teams up with a rebel fighter (Jessica Biel) on a search to find the head of the underground resistance and take down the leader (Bryan Cranston) of the free world.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Recently killed in action, soldier Ray Garrison gets a new lease on life when the RST Corp. brings him back from the dead. With an army of nanotechnology in his veins, he's an unstoppable force -- stronger than ever with the power to heal instantly. But when the company decides to manipulate his mind and memories, Garrison must embark on a desperate mission to find out what's real and what's not.

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: A rookie policewoman in New Orleans inadvertently captures the shooting death of a young drug dealer on her body cam. After realizing the murder was committed by corrupt cops, she teams up with the only person from the community who's willing to help her. Now, she finds herself on the run from both the vengeful criminals and the lawmen who desperately want to destroy the incriminating footage.

programme.title: The Musketeer
programme.desc: Weds the classic swordplay and chivalry of Alexandre Dumas' "The Three Musketeers" with the gravity-defying dazzle of Hong Kong action choreography. The film's fight sequences mix eastern and western styles, fusing 17th century swashbuckling with samurai action.

programme.title: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Sgt. Tom Hardy (Bruce Willis) denounces his partner, Jimmy Detillo (Robert Pastorelli), for brutally interrogating a suspect. After Jimmy falls to his death from a bridge, Tom is transferred from homicide to the river rescue team. Two years later, the bodies of murdered young women begin turning up in the water -- all of whom were previously romantically linked to Tom. With the help of his new partner, Jo Christman (Sarah Jessica Parker), Tom sets out to find the killer.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Crockett's new romance distracts him from the investigation of three doped-up teenagers wreaking havoc in downtown Miami.

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: Flu-sufferer Bonnie sees a man in a gorilla suit strangle a woman, but no one will believe her.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2
programme.desc: When the Reys move into their new Southern California home, little do they realize that the house is already occupied. After coming home one day to find the house in disarray -- but with no signs of forced entry or robbery -- they install a video surveillance system to catch the perpetrators. But nothing prepares them for what happens next.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Elena Houghlin is a scientist, engineer and inventor of Calisto -- a sustainable energy source that will revolutionize the way people use power. But when the cutting edge technology falls into the wrong hands, Elena turns to the Townsend Agency for help. Now, it's up to the Angels -- Jane, Sabina and the newly recruited Elena -- to retrieve Calisto before it can be transformed into a weapon of mass destruction.

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: For Buffy Summers (Kristy Swanson), nothing is the same after she meets Merrick Jamison-Smythe (Donald Sutherland). Merrick tells the teen that he's been sent to train her to fight vampires, and he proves himself by displaying his supernatural powers. Buffy is a quick study, and soon takes fellow student Oliver Pike (Luke Perry) under her wing, repeatedly saving him from fierce bloodsuckers. But, when a very dangerous vampire (Rutger Hauer) gets rambunctious, she must go to war again.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A disparate group of individuals takes refuge in an abandoned house when corpses begin to leave the graveyard in search of fresh human bodies to devour. The pragmatic Ben (Duane Jones) does his best to control the situation, but when the reanimated bodies surround the house, the other survivors begin to panic. As any semblance of order within the group begins to dissipate, the zombies start to find ways inside -- and one by one, the living humans become the prey of the deceased ones.

programme.title: Shark Night
programme.desc: Newly arrived at her family's lake-island cabin, college student Sara (Sara Paxton) and her friends prepare for a weekend of fun in the sun. But soon after they dive into the lake, football player Malik (Sinqua Walls) stumbles out of the water with a grievous wound. Thinking Malik is the victim of a freak accident, the friends pile into a tiny speedboat and head for the hospital. To their horror, they discover that they are surrounded by hundreds of massive, hungry sharks.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Elena Houghlin is a scientist, engineer and inventor of Calisto -- a sustainable energy source that will revolutionize the way people use power. But when the cutting edge technology falls into the wrong hands, Elena turns to the Townsend Agency for help. Now, it's up to the Angels -- Jane, Sabina and the newly recruited Elena -- to retrieve Calisto before it can be transformed into a weapon of mass destruction.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Recently killed in action, soldier Ray Garrison gets a new lease on life when the RST Corp. brings him back from the dead. With an army of nanotechnology in his veins, he's an unstoppable force -- stronger than ever with the power to heal instantly. But when the company decides to manipulate his mind and memories, Garrison must embark on a desperate mission to find out what's real and what's not.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 2

After coming home one day to find the house in disarray -- but with no signs of forced entry or robbery -- they install a video surveillance system to catch the perpetrators. But nothing prepares them for what happens next.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: This sequel to William Friedkin's 1971 crime drama finds Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) still hot on the trail of slippery drug trafficker Charnier (Fernando Rey), but this time in Marseilles, France. Uprooted from his familiar New York City beat, Doyle struggles to assert himself in a strange city and break the drug ring wide open. When Charnier's goons force him into a heroin addiction, the tough cop must summon every ounce of his courage to kick the habit cold turkey.

programme.title: Shark Night
programme.desc: Newly arrived at her family's lake-island cabin, college student Sara (Sara Paxton) and her friends prepare for a weekend of fun in the sun. But soon after they dive into the lake, football player Malik (Sinqua Walls) stumbles out of the water with a grievous wound. Thinking Malik is the victim of a freak accident, the friends pile into a tiny speedboat and head for the hospital. To their horror, they discover that they are surrounded by hundreds of massive, hungry sharks.

programme.title: Sharky's Machine
programme.desc: An Atlanta vice-squad detective (Burt Reynolds) loves a high-class call girl (Rachel Ward) linked to politics and a mob boss (Vittorio Gassman).

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Elena Houghlin is a scientist, engineer and inventor of Calisto -- a sustainable energy source that will revolutionize the way people use power. But when the cutting edge technology falls into the wrong hands, Elena turns to the Townsend Agency for help. Now, it's up to the Angels -- Jane, Sabina and the newly recruited Elena -- to retrieve Calisto before it can be transformed into a weapon of mass destruction.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: This sequel to William Friedkin's 1971 crime drama finds Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) still hot on the trail of slippery drug trafficker Charnier (Fernando Rey), but this time in Marseilles, France. Uprooted from his familiar New York City beat, Doyle struggles to assert himself in a strange city and break the drug ring wide open. When Charnier's goons force him into a heroin addiction, the tough cop must summon every ounce of his courage to kick the habit cold turkey.

programme.title: The Eiger Sanction
programme.desc: Former government assassin Jonathan Hemlock (Clint Eastwood) now devotes his time to teaching and collecting paintings, but his quiet life is interrupted when he is persuaded by his former employers work for them again. Hemlock has to join a crew of explorers (George Kennedy, Jack Cassidy) on a trip up the Eiger, a treacherous Swiss mountain. Hemlock must simultaneously determine which of his fellow climbers is a Soviet spy, kill his target and scale the deadly peak.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: Following the terrorist attacks of Sept. 11, 2001, Osama bin Laden becomes one of the most-wanted men on the planet. The worldwide manhunt for the terrorist leader occupies the resources and attention of two U.S. presidential administrations. Ultimately, it is the work of a dedicated female operative (Jessica Chastain) that proves instrumental in finally locating bin Laden. In May 2011, Navy SEALs launch a nighttime strike, killing bin Laden in his compound in Abbottabad, Pakistan.

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: Michael helps a toy maker and is targeted for death by old adversary Cameron Zachery (John Vernon).

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: In a stunning dual role, international star Jet Li portrays Gabriel Yulaw, a police officer confronted with a sinister form of himself escaped from an advanced, parallel universe and intent on killing Gabriel. His alter ego's hunt culminates in a fateful battle between good and evil that changes Gabriel's perception of reality and forces him to examine the evil hidden within himself.

programme.title: Curse of the Golden Flower
programme.desc: In 928 A.D. a power struggle emerges in the palace of China's emperor (Chow Yun-Fat). A cruel man, he is secretly having his wife (Gong Li) poisoned with a substance that will eventually drive her insane. Meanwhile the empress is having an affair with Prince Wan (Ye Liu), her husband's son from a previous marriage. But the prince secretly wishes to run away with Chan (Li Man), the daughter of the imperial doctor.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: Following the terrorist attacks of Sept. 11, 2001, Osama bin Laden becomes one of the most-wanted men on the planet. The worldwide manhunt for the terrorist leader occupies the resources and attention of two U.S. presidential administrations. Ultimately, it is the work of a dedicated female operative (Jessica Chastain) that proves instrumental in finally locating bin Laden. In May 2011, Navy SEALs launch a nighttime strike, killing bin Laden in his compound in Abbottabad, Pakistan.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In 19th century Qing Dynasty China, a warrior (Chow Yun-Fat) gives his sword, Green Destiny, to his lover (Michelle Yeoh) to deliver to safe keeping, but it is stolen, and the chase is on to find it. The search leads to the House of Yu where the story takes on a whole different level.

programme.title: The Newton Boys
programme.desc: Seeking an escape from poverty, sibling Texas farmers (Matthew McConaughey, Skeet Ulrich, Ethan Hawke) gain notoriety as daring 1920s bank robbers.

programme.title: The Raid 2
programme.desc: After surviving a bloody fight with powerful gangsters, rookie Jakarta cop Rama (Iko Uwais) thinks he can resume a normal life. However, his exploits during that fateful incident have attracted the attention of criminals even more deadly than the last. His family at risk, Rama has no choice but to go under cover. He gets himself thrown in prison, where he befriends the son of a prominent crime kingpin. Rama must lay his own life on the line to finally destroy the criminal empire.

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: In a stunning dual role, international star Jet Li portrays Gabriel Yulaw, a police officer confronted with a sinister form of himself escaped from an advanced, parallel universe and intent on killing Gabriel. His alter ego's hunt culminates in a fateful battle between good and evil that changes Gabriel's perception of reality and forces him to examine the evil hidden within himself.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In 19th century Qing Dynasty China, a warrior (Chow Yun-Fat) gives his sword, Green Destiny, to his lover (Michelle Yeoh) to deliver to safe keeping, but it is stolen, and the chase is on to find it. The search leads to the House of Yu where the story takes on a whole different level.

A cruel man, he is secretly having his wife (Gong Li) poisoned with a substance that will eventually drive her insane. Meanwhile the empress is having an affair with Prince Wan (Ye Liu), her husband's son from a previous marriage. But the prince secretly wishes to run away with Chan (Li Man), the daughter of the imperial doctor.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: Soon after moving into a suburban tract home, Katie (Katie Featherston) and Micah (Micah Sloat) become increasingly disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence. Hoping to capture evidence of it on film, they set up video cameras in the house but are not prepared for the terrifying events that follow.

programme.title: John Carpenter's The Thing
programme.desc: In remote Antarctica, a group of American research scientists are disturbed at their base camp by a helicopter shooting at a sled dog. When they take in the dog, it brutally attacks both human beings and canines in the camp and they discover that the beast can assume the shape of its victims. A resourceful helicopter pilot (Kurt Russell) and the camp doctor (Richard Dysart) lead the camp crew in a desperate, gory battle against the vicious creature before it picks them all off, one by one.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: This sequel to William Friedkin's 1971 crime drama finds Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) still hot on the trail of slippery drug trafficker Charnier (Fernando Rey), but this time in Marseilles, France. Uprooted from his familiar New York City beat, Doyle struggles to assert himself in a strange city and break the drug ring wide open. When Charnier's goons force him into a heroin addiction, the tough cop must summon every ounce of his courage to kick the habit cold turkey.

programme.desc: In 19th century Qing Dynasty China, a warrior (Chow Yun-Fat) gives his sword, Green Destiny, to his lover (Michelle Yeoh) to deliver to safe keeping, but it is stolen, and the chase is on to find it. The search leads to the House of Yu where the story takes on a whole different level.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A.
programme.desc: In 2013, the United States president (Cliff Robertson) is exiling all citizens who don't conform to his hyper-conservative views to Los Angeles, which became an island after a huge earthquake. But, when the president's daughter nabs the detonator to her dad's apocalyptic weapon and sneaks into L.A. to be with the rebel leader she loves, the government taps commando-turned-crook Snake Plissken (Kurt Russell) to retrieve the young woman. And, if he doesn't succeed quickly, he'll be executed.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: Soon after moving into a suburban tract home, Katie (Katie Featherston) and Micah (Micah Sloat) become increasingly disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence. Hoping to capture evidence of it on film, they set up video cameras in the house but are not prepared for the terrifying events that follow.

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: When the Italian Mafia threatens to kill a crooked bookie (John Turturro), Irish mob boss Leo O'Bannon (Albert Finney) refuses to allow it, chiefly because he's dating the bookie's sister, crafty gun moll Verna Bernbaum (Marcia Gay Harden). Leo's right-hand man, Tom Reagan (Gabriel Byrne), is also seeing Verna on the sly, and when he's found out is obliged to switch sides, going to work for the Italian mob amidst a dramatically escalating gang war over liquor distribution.

programme.title: French Connection II
programme.desc: This sequel to William Friedkin's 1971 crime drama finds Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) still hot on the trail of slippery drug trafficker Charnier (Fernando Rey), but this time in Marseilles, France. Uprooted from his familiar New York City beat, Doyle struggles to assert himself in a strange city and break the drug ring wide open. When Charnier's goons force him into a heroin addiction, the tough cop must summon every ounce of his courage to kick the habit cold turkey.

programme.title: Ghosts of Mars
programme.desc: Long inhabited by human settlers, the Red Planet has become the manifest destiny of an over-populated Earth. Nearly 640,000 people now live and work all over Mars, mining the planet for its abundant natural resources. But one of those mining operations has uncovered a deadly mother lode: a long-dormant Martian civilization whose warriors are systematically taking over the bodies of human intruders.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity
programme.desc: Soon after moving into a suburban tract home, Katie (Katie Featherston) and Micah (Micah Sloat) become increasingly disturbed by what appears to be a supernatural presence. Hoping to capture evidence of it on film, they set up video cameras in the house but are not prepared for the terrifying events that follow.

programme.title: Eye of the Beholder
programme.desc: British spy Steve Wilson (Ewan McGregor), known as "The Eye" to his employers, is trailing Paul Hugo (Steven McCarthy) for an assignment when he witnesses Paul being murdered by his girlfriend, Joanna Eris (Ashley Judd). Haunted by the breakup of his marriage and by his absent daughter, Lucy (Ann-Marie Brown), Steve notices Joanna's resemblance to his child and decides to protect her. As Joanna wanders the United States, Steve follows and destroys evidence of her multiple killings.

programme.title: John Carpenter's The Thing
programme.desc: In remote Antarctica, a group of American research scientists are disturbed at their base camp by a helicopter shooting at a sled dog. When they take in the dog, it brutally attacks both human beings and canines in the camp and they discover that the beast can assume the shape of its victims. A resourceful helicopter pilot (Kurt Russell) and the camp doctor (Richard Dysart) lead the camp crew in a desperate, gory battle against the vicious creature before it picks them all off, one by one.

programme.title: The Little Rascals Save the Day
programme.desc: Spanky (Jet Jurgensmeyer), Alfalfa (Drew Justice) and the rest of the gang try to raise enough cash to save a bakery.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: Jen (Stephen Garlick), raised by the noble race called the Mystics, has been told that he is the last survivor of his own race, the Gelflings. He sets out to try to find a shard of the dark crystal, a powerful gem that once provided balance to the universe. After the crystal was broken, the evil Skeksis used sinister means to gain control. Jen believes that he can repair the dark crystal and bring peace back to the world, if he can only find the remaining shard.

programme.title: The Snow Queen: Mirrorlands
programme.desc: After a powerful king nearly loses his family due to the Snow Queen's evil deeds, he finds a way to ban all magic from the world.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Twenty-thousand years ago, Earth is a wondrous, prehistoric world filled with great danger, not the least of which is the beginning of the Ice Age. To avoid a really bad frostbite, the planet's majestic creatures - and a few small, slothful ones - begin migrating south . The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

programme.title: The Land Before Time II: The Great Valley Adventure
programme.desc: After his tribe of herbivorous dinosaurs moves to the carnivore-free Peaceful Valley in the animated "The Land Before Time," young brontosaurus Littlefoot (Scott McAfee) and his friends chase after a pair of dangerous dinosaurs stealing an egg from the village. While running, they accidentally cause a landslide that opens up their home to outsiders. When the egg they bring back and hatch reveals not one of their own, but a carnivorous tyrannosaurus, the youngsters decide to secretly raise it.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lucy Whipple
programme.desc: A recent widow (Glenn Close) moves with her three children to the new frontier of California during the gold rush.

programme.title: Watch Out!
programme.desc: Educators and media experts discuss responsible TV viewing.

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Luckily for young Arlo, his parents (Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand) and his two siblings, the mighty dinosaurs were not wiped out 65 million years ago. When a rainstorm washes poor Arlo (Raymond Ochoa) downriver, he ends up bruised, battered and miles away from home. Good fortune shines on the frightened dino when he meets Spot (Jack Bright), a Neanderthal boy who offers his help and friendship. Together, the unlikely duo embark on an epic adventure to reunite Arlo with his beloved family.

programme.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
programme.desc: A kingdom unites to prevent a villain from destroying Christmas.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
programme.desc: The princess and her prince adopt a little girl, but the child is soon kidnapped and taken into the forest.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: In the years after the Civil War, Jo March lives in New York and makes her living as a writer, while her sister Amy studies painting in Paris. Amy has a chance encounter with Theodore, a childhood crush who proposed to Jo but was ultimately rejected. Their oldest sibling, Meg, is married to a schoolteacher, while shy sister Beth develops a devastating illness that brings the family back together.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lucy Whipple
programme.desc: A recent widow (Glenn Close) moves with her three children to the new frontier of California during the gold rush.

programme.title: The Wizard
programme.desc: After his little brother, Jimmy (Luke Edwards), is put in a mental institution, Corey (Fred Savage) breaks him out and the pair run off together to California. On their travels, Corey meets a girl named Haley (Jenny Lewis) and discovers that Jimmy is a master at playing video games. With talents like his, he could easily win the top prize of $50,000 at Video Armageddon. While the three travelers hitchhike to the competition, the boys' parents hire a bounty hunter to track them down.

programme.title: Flicka 2
programme.desc: A teen (Tammin Sursok) develops a special bond with a wild mustang when she moves to her father's (Patrick Warburton) Wyoming horse ranch.

programme.title: Flicka: Country Pride
programme.desc: Toby (Clint Black) and Flicka step in to help a stable owner (Lisa Hartman Black) and her daughter (Kacey Rohl) save their business from falling to a rival horse trainer who is stealing their clients.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: When monsters want to get away from it all, they go to Count Dracula's (Adam Sandler) Hotel Transylvania, a lavish resort where they can be themselves without humans around to bother them. On one special weekend, Dracula invites creatures like the Invisible Man, the Mummy and others to celebrate the 118th birthday of his daughter, Mavis (Selena Gomez). However, an unforeseen complication unfolds when an ordinary human unwittingly crashes the party and falls in love with Mavis.

programme.title: Aliens Ate My Homework
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Rod Allbright and his cousin Elspeth help the Galactic Patrol protect Earth from a nefarious threat.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: In the years after the Civil War, Jo March lives in New York and makes her living as a writer, while her sister Amy studies painting in Paris. Amy has a chance encounter with Theodore, a childhood crush who proposed to Jo but was ultimately rejected. programme.title: The Big Bad Fox and Other Tales...
programme.desc: The countryside isn't always as calm and peaceful as it's made out to be, and the animals on this farm are particularly agitated: a fox who mothers a family of chicks, a rabbit who plays the stork, and a duck who wants to be Santa Claus.

programme.title: The Wizard
programme.desc: After his little brother, Jimmy (Luke Edwards), is put in a mental institution, Corey (Fred Savage) breaks him out and the pair run off together to California. programme.title: Flicka 2
programme.desc: A teen (Tammin Sursok) develops a special bond with a wild mustang when she moves to her father's (Patrick Warburton) Wyoming horse ranch.

programme.title: Flicka: Country Pride
programme.desc: Toby (Clint Black) and Flicka step in to help a stable owner (Lisa Hartman Black) and her daughter (Kacey Rohl) save their business from falling to a rival horse trainer who is stealing their clients.

programme.title: Jetsons: The Movie
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon series, this animated movie, set in a time filled with family-sized spacecrafts and intergalactic travel, begins with hardworking family man George Jetson (George O'Hanlon) ecstatic when his cranky boss, Mr. Spacely (Mel Blanc), gives him a promotion that relocates him, his wife (Penny Singleton) and the rest of his family to the far reaches of space. However, while other family members are enjoying the move, George finds trouble at the new job right away.

programme.title: Mary and The Witch's Flower
programme.desc: Young Mary follows a mysterious cat into the nearby forest and discovers an old broomstick and the strange Fly-by-Night flower, a rare plant that blossoms once every seven years. Together, the flower and the broomstick whisk Mary above the clouds, and far away to Endor College -- a school of magic run by headmistress Madam Mumblechook and the brilliant Doctor Dee. But there are terrible things happening at the school, and when Mary tells a lie, she must risk her life to try and set things right.

programme.title: A Troll in Central Park
programme.desc: After being banished from his grim kingdom, Stanley (Dom DeLuise), an amiable troll with a magical talent for growing greenery, ends up in Central Park. Struggling to adapt to his unfamiliar surroundings, Stanley is befriended by young Gus (Phillip Glasser) and his little sister, Rosie (Tawny Sunshine Glover). Soon, however, the evil troll queen, Gnorga (Cloris Leachman), sets out to make Stanley's life miserable, endangering both him and the children.

programme.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
programme.desc: A kingdom unites to prevent a villain from destroying Christmas.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Mystery of the Enchanted Treasure
programme.desc: The spirited animals of Swan Lake help their prince and princess save the kingdom from a sinister sorceress.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: Born with the snout of a pig, young Penelope Wilhern (Christina Ricci) spends life a virtual prisoner in her home. Believing that the only way to break the curse is to marry one of her own kind, she meets a number of suitors, but all reject her. Two devious men, one with a grudge against the family, hire a man (James McAvoy) to pose as a suitor, but complications arise when he begins to fall in love with Penelope, and she makes a bid for freedom.

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: Anna, an English schoolteacher, travels to the kingdom of Siam to teach children and finds her challenge with a stubborn king. But even as a wondrous friendship grows between Anna and the arrogant monarch, an evil sorcerer is conjuring up a plot to steal the throne.

programme.title: Yellowbird
programme.desc: Yellowbird (Seth Green), a tiny orphaned bird that has never left the nest, suddenly finds himself leading a flock on its migration to Africa.

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: Charley nurses Spider's horse back to health, only to see Doyle place the animal back in the constricting mines.

programme.title: The Adventures of Brer Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit (Nick Cannon) hatches clever schemes to gleefully outwit bigger animals.

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: Molly asks Nellie to help make her more feminine; Ned is reluctant to help the miners after he lost the election to Doyle.

programme.title: Yellowbird

programme.title: Guardians of Oz
programme.desc: Ozzy, a winged monkey, seeks help from the Tin Woodman, the Cowardly Lion and the Scarecrow to stop the evil plans of the wicked Evilene.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
programme.desc: The princess and her prince adopt a little girl, but the child is soon kidnapped and taken into the forest.

programme.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
programme.desc: A kingdom unites to prevent a villain from destroying Christmas.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

programme.title: The Adventures of Brer Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit (Nick Cannon) hatches clever schemes to gleefully outwit bigger animals.

programme.title: Flicka: Country Pride
programme.desc: Toby (Clint Black) and Flicka step in to help a stable owner (Lisa Hartman Black) and her daughter (Kacey Rohl) save their business from falling to a rival horse trainer who is stealing their clients.

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Luckily for young Arlo, his parents (Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand) and his two siblings, the mighty dinosaurs were not wiped out 65 million years ago. Together, the unlikely duo embark on an epic adventure to reunite Arlo with his beloved family.

programme.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
programme.desc: A kingdom unites to prevent a villain from destroying Christmas.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Col. Claus von Stauffenberg (Tom Cruise) serves Germany with loyalty and pride but fears that Hitler will destroy his country if allowed to run unchecked. With time running out for Germany and the rest of Europe, von Stauffenberg joins a group of like-minded, high-ranking men who want to overthrow the Nazi regime from within. With everything he holds dear in the balance, von Stauffenberg becomes the trigger man in a plot to assassinate the evil dictator.

programme.title: Untraceable
programme.desc: Special Agent Jennifer Marsh (Diane Lane) works in an elite division of the FBI dedicated to fighting cybercrime. She thinks she has seen it all, until a particularly sadistic criminal arises on the Internet. This tech-savvy killer posts live feeds of his crimes on his website; the more hits the site gets, the faster the victim dies. Marsh and her team must find the elusive killer before time runs out.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy
programme.desc: Charismatic art critic James Figueras and his American lover travel to the lavish Lake Como estate of powerful art collector, Joseph Cassidy. Their host reveals he is the patron of Jerome Debney, the reclusive J.D. Salinger of the art world, and he has a simple request: for James to steal a Debney masterpiece from the artist's studio, whatever the cost.

programme.title: Critters 3
programme.desc: Hairy little aliens make their way to a city in search of their favorite snack.

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: Trapped in their New York brownstone's panic room, a hidden chamber built as a sanctuary in the event of break-ins, newly divorced Meg Altman (Jodie Foster) and her young daughter Sarah (Kristen Stewart) play a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with three intruders - Burnham (Forest Whitaker), Raoul (Dwight Yoakam) and Junior (Jared Leto) - during a brutal home invasion. But the room itself is the focal point because what the intruders really want is inside it.

programme.title: The Covenant
programme.desc: In the 17th century, five families with supernatural powers make a pact of silence. Eventually one power-hungry family is banished. The descendants of those four remaining families are heirs to tremendous power. Known as the Sons of Ipswich, the boys attend elite Spencer Academy. When a student there is found dead after a party, unraveling secrets threaten to shatter the pact that has protected the boys' families for centuries.

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: A man (Kellan Lutz) has to fight to the death for the entertainment of the online masses.

programme.title: Motives
programme.desc: A successful businessman (Shemar Moore) gets caught in a web of deceit after cheating on his wife (Vivica A. Fox).

programme.title: Innocent Blood
programme.desc: Marie is a vampire with a conscience: She only sucks the blood of criminals. And she has plenty to choose from on the mean streets of Pittsburgh, where a gang war is raging. But Marie slips up when she accidentally turns a violent crime lord, Sal Macelli (Robert Loggia), into one of the walking dead. To stop a takeover of the city by blood-sucking gangsters, Marie joins forces with an undercover cop (Anthony LaPaglia) who has his own score to settle.

programme.title: The Replacement Killers
programme.desc: Hired assassin John Lee (Chow Yun-Fat) is asked by Chinatown crime boss Terence Wei (Kenneth Tsang) to murder the young son of policeman Stan Zedkov (Michael Rooker). Lee has the boy in his sights, but his conscience gets the better of him, and he spares the child's life. Afraid that Wei will take revenge on his family in China, Lee seeks out expert forger Meg Coburn (Mira Sorvino) to obtain the passport he needs to get out of the country, but a band of replacement killers is soon on his trail.

programme.title: The Burnt Orange Heresy
programme.desc: Charismatic art critic James Figueras and his American lover travel to the lavish Lake Como estate of powerful art collector, Joseph Cassidy. Their host reveals he is the patron of Jerome Debney, the reclusive J.D. Salinger of the art world, and he has a simple request: for James to steal a Debney masterpiece from the artist's studio, whatever the cost.

programme.title: Looper
programme.desc: In a future society, time-travel exists, but it's only available to those with the means to pay for it on the black market. When the mob wants to eliminate someone, it sends the target into the past, where a hit man known as a looper lies in wait to finish the job. Joe (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is one such hired gun, and he does his job well -- until the day his bosses decide to "close the loop" and send Joe's future self (Bruce Willis) back in time to be killed.

programme.title: The Covenant
programme.desc: In the 17th century, five families with supernatural powers make a pact of silence. Eventually one power-hungry family is banished. The descendants of those four remaining families are heirs to tremendous power. Known as the Sons of Ipswich, the boys attend elite Spencer Academy. When a student there is found dead after a party, unraveling secrets threaten to shatter the pact that has protected the boys' families for centuries.

Afraid that Wei will take revenge on his family in China, Lee seeks out expert forger Meg Coburn (Mira Sorvino) to obtain the passport he needs to get out of the country, but a band of replacement killers is soon on his trail.

programme.title: Chloe
programme.desc: Catherine and David Stewart (Julianne Moore, Liam Neeson) are a well-to-do couple living in a posh area of Toronto, but all is not well in paradise. Catherine suspects that David, a music professor, is cheating on her with his students. She hires a prostitute named Chloe (Amanda Seyfried) to meet David and see if he gives in to temptation, but events spin out of control when Chloe spills the details of her torrid encounters.

programme.title: Looper
programme.desc: In a future society, time-travel exists, but it's only available to those with the means to pay for it on the black market. When the mob wants to eliminate someone, it sends the target into the past, where a hit man known as a looper lies in wait to finish the job. Joe (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) is one such hired gun, and he does his job well -- until the day his bosses decide to "close the loop" and send Joe's future self (Bruce Willis) back in time to be killed.

programme.title: The Marine 4: Moving Target
programme.desc: Jake Carter (Mike Mizanin) must protect a beautiful whistle-blower (Summer Rae) from a team of heavily armed mercenaries sent by a corrupt defense contractor.

programme.title: Natural Born Killers
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson and Juliette Lewis are two young, attractive serial killers who become tabloid-TV darlings, thanks to a sensationalistic press led by Robert Downey Jr. The press reports the pair as they go on a 52 people killing spree. A controversial look at the way the media portrays criminals.

programme.title: Chloe
programme.desc: Catherine and David Stewart (Julianne Moore, Liam Neeson) are a well-to-do couple living in a posh area of Toronto, but all is not well in paradise. Catherine suspects that David, a music professor, is cheating on her with his students. She hires a prostitute named Chloe (Amanda Seyfried) to meet David and see if he gives in to temptation, but events spin out of control when Chloe spills the details of her torrid encounters.

programme.title: After the Sunset
programme.desc: Having already stolen two from the set of three priceless Napoleon Diamonds, expert jewel thief Max Burdett (Pierce Brosnan) decides to retire on a tropical island with his girlfriend and partner-in-crime, Lola (Salma Hayek). Fate intervenes, however, when Max discovers the third and final diamond is sitting on a docked cruise ship on his very island. It should be a simple job, but FBI agent Stan Lloyd (Woody Harrelson) shows up to make sure Max doesn't get any ideas.

programme.title: Anthropoid
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Birth
programme.desc: It took Anna (Nicole Kidman) 10 years to recover from the death of her husband, Sean, but now she's on the verge of marrying her boyfriend, Joseph (Danny Huston), and finally moving on. However, on the night of her engagement party, a young boy named Sean (Cameron Bright) turns up, saying he is her dead husband reincarnated. At first she ignores the child, but his knowledge of her former husband's life is uncanny, leading her to believe that he might be telling the truth.

programme.title: The Marine 4: Moving Target
programme.desc: Jake Carter (Mike Mizanin) must protect a beautiful whistle-blower (Summer Rae) from a team of heavily armed mercenaries sent by a corrupt defense contractor.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Mia (Jane Levy), a drug addict, is determined to kick the habit. To that end, she asks her brother, David (Shiloh Fernandez), his girlfriend, Natalie (Elizabeth Blackmore) and their friends Olivia (Jessica Lucas) and Eric (Lou Taylor Pucci) to accompany her to their family's remote forest cabin to help her through withdrawal. Eric finds a mysterious Book of the Dead at the cabin and reads aloud from it, awakening an ancient demon. All hell breaks loose when the malevolent entity possesses Mia.

programme.title: Chloe
programme.desc: Catherine and David Stewart (Julianne Moore, Liam Neeson) are a well-to-do couple living in a posh area of Toronto, but all is not well in paradise. Catherine suspects that David, a music professor, is cheating on her with his students. She hires a prostitute named Chloe (Amanda Seyfried) to meet David and see if he gives in to temptation, but events spin out of control when Chloe spills the details of her torrid encounters.

programme.title: The Crush
programme.desc: Writer Nick Eliot (Cary Elwes) moves to a new city for a magazine job and rents a room in the house of Cliff (Kurtwood Smith) and Liv Forrester (Gwynyth Walsh), whose 14-year-old daughter, Adrian (Alicia Silverstone), instantly makes her attraction to Nick clear. While Nick romances photographer Amy Maddik (Jennifer Rubin) at work, he has trouble fending off Adrian's advances. As her obsession with Nick grows, Adrian becomes angry at being rejected and starts attacking his property and friends.

programme.title: Birth
programme.desc: It took Anna (Nicole Kidman) 10 years to recover from the death of her husband, Sean, but now she's on the verge of marrying her boyfriend, Joseph (Danny Huston), and finally moving on. However, on the night of her engagement party, a young boy named Sean (Cameron Bright) turns up, saying he is her dead husband reincarnated. At first she ignores the child, but his knowledge of her former husband's life is uncanny, leading her to believe that he might be telling the truth.

programme.title: Bloodline
programme.desc: Haunted by dark memories of childhood abuse, Evan, a social worker and first-time dad, struggles to keep his need for revenge in check.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Mia (Jane Levy), a drug addict, is determined to kick the habit. To that end, she asks her brother, David (Shiloh Fernandez), his girlfriend, Natalie (Elizabeth Blackmore) and their friends Olivia (Jessica Lucas) and Eric (Lou Taylor Pucci) to accompany her to their family's remote forest cabin to help her through withdrawal. Eric finds a mysterious Book of the Dead at the cabin and reads aloud from it, awakening an ancient demon. All hell breaks loose when the malevolent entity possesses Mia.

programme.title: The Crush
programme.desc: Writer Nick Eliot (Cary Elwes) moves to a new city for a magazine job and rents a room in the house of Cliff (Kurtwood Smith) and Liv Forrester (Gwynyth Walsh), whose 14-year-old daughter, Adrian (Alicia Silverstone), instantly makes her attraction to Nick clear. While Nick romances photographer Amy Maddik (Jennifer Rubin) at work, he has trouble fending off Adrian's advances. As her obsession with Nick grows, Adrian becomes angry at being rejected and starts attacking his property and friends.

programme.title: My Soul to Take
programme.desc: In the small town of Riverton, a local legend tells of a serial killer's oath to come back and kill the seven children who were born on the night he supposedly died. Now 16 years later, Riverton residents are disappearing again, making some wonder if the legend is true. Bug (Max Thieriot), plagued by nightmares all his life, is one of the so-called Riverton Seven, and it's up to him to save his friends from an evil that will not rest.

programme.title: Tales From the Hood
programme.desc: A creepy mortician, Mr. Simms (Clarence Williams III), attempts to scare teenage drug dealer Stack (Joe Torry) and his friends straight by telling them four horrifying stories. One is about a guilt-riddled cop (Anthony Griffith) who goes crazy after ignoring his corrupt partner (Michael Massee). He also tells of a meek schoolboy (Brandon Hammond) with terrifying supernatural powers. Although the young thugs want to take their drugs and escape Mr. Simms, he still has two more tales to tell.

programme.title: Bloodline
programme.desc: Haunted by dark memories of childhood abuse, Evan, a social worker and first-time dad, struggles to keep his need for revenge in check.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland
programme.desc: It's International Elvis Week in Las Vegas, where the strip is flooded by a sea of King wannabes decked out in jumpsuits and sideburns. But five of the impersonators swaggering into the Riviera Hotel are toting heavy weaponry in their guitar cases. It's the heist of a lifetime, orchestrated by ex-con Michael (Kurt Russell) and his cunning former cellmate, Murphy (Kevin Costner). The crooked Elvises steal away with $3.2 million, leaving the hotel in ruins and a high body count in their wake.

programme.title: The Fury
programme.desc: When a devious plot separates CIA agent Peter Sandza (Kirk Douglas) from his son, Robin (Andrew Stevens), the distraught father manages to see through the ruse. Taken because of his psychic abilities, Robin is being held by Ben Childress (John Cassavetes), who is studying people with supernatural powers in hopes of developing their talents as weapons. Soon Peter pairs up with Gillian (Amy Irving), a teen who has telekinesis, to find and rescue Robin.

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Discreet, idealistic and intensely loyal, Edward Wilson (Matt Damon) finds that service in the OSS and later as a founding member of the Central Intelligence Agency is the perfect career for a man of his talents. His methods become standard operating procedure for the CIA while he combats his counterparts in the KGB. But, as the country slips deeper into the Cold War, Edward finds that dedication to duty above family has a price.

programme.title: Gigli
programme.desc: Gigli (Ben Affleck) is ordered to kidnap the psychologically challenged younger brother of a powerful federal prosecutor. When plans go awry, Gigli's boss sends in Ricki (Jennifer Lopez), a gorgeous free-spirited female gangster who has her own set of orders to assist with the kidnapping. But Gigli begins falling for the decidedly unavailable Ricki, which could be a hazard to his occupation.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: Master criminal Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro) is trying to control the rogue actions of one of his men, while also planning one last big heist before retiring. Meanwhile, Lieutenant Hanna (Al Pacino) attempts to track down McCauley as he deals with the chaos in his own life, including the infidelity of his wife (Diane Venora) and the mental health of his stepdaughter (Natalie Portman). McCauley and Hanna discover a mutual respect, even as they try to thwart each other's plans.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland
programme.desc: It's International Elvis Week in Las Vegas, where the strip is flooded by a sea of King wannabes decked out in jumpsuits and sideburns. But five of the impersonators swaggering into the Riviera Hotel are toting heavy weaponry in their guitar cases. programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: Master criminal Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro) is trying to control the rogue actions of one of his men, while also planning one last big heist before retiring. Meanwhile, Lieutenant Hanna (Al Pacino) attempts to track down McCauley as he deals with the chaos in his own life, including the infidelity of his wife (Diane Venora) and the mental health of his stepdaughter (Natalie Portman). McCauley and Hanna discover a mutual respect, even as they try to thwart each other's plans.

programme.title: Kings
programme.desc: Millie is a hardworking, tough and protective Los Angeles single mother with an affection for homeless children. Her neighbor Obie is the local loose cannon -- and the only white man -- in an area largely inhabited by African-Americans, Latinos and Koreans. With racial tensions running high, Millie and Obie appear to be unlikely allies. But following the acquittal of four of the officers accused of beating Rodney King, the two of them must navigate the gathering chaos in the city.

programme.title: Linewatch
programme.desc: Border agent Michael Dixon's (Cuba Gooding Jr.) past as a gang member comes back to haunt him years later.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: An ex-con takes a job truck driving across the country. However, the truck is filled with illegal weapons and now he must fight to save his family. The stakes are high as gun runners, government agents and a fleet of monstrous 18-wheelers pursue him in an intense highway duel.

programme.title: Chill Factor
programme.desc: A decade after chemical weapon "Elvis" kills 18 soldiers during a test, military scapegoat Andrew (Peter Firth) gets out of jail and tracks down scientist Richard (David Paymer) in Montana -- who shoots him. Andrew manages to tell his friend Tim (Skeet Ulrich) to get Elvis to safety at a fort 90 miles away. However, if exposed to a temperature higher than 50 degrees, the weapon will go off, so Andrew forces ice-cream-truck driver Arlo (Cuba Gooding Jr.) to help him transport the device.

programme.title: Kings
programme.desc: Millie is a hardworking, tough and protective Los Angeles single mother with an affection for homeless children. Her neighbor Obie is the local loose cannon -- and the only white man -- in an area largely inhabited by African-Americans, Latinos and Koreans. With racial tensions running high, Millie and Obie appear to be unlikely allies. But following the acquittal of four of the officers accused of beating Rodney King, the two of them must navigate the gathering chaos in the city.

programme.title: Untraceable
programme.desc: Special Agent Jennifer Marsh (Diane Lane) works in an elite division of the FBI dedicated to fighting cybercrime. She thinks she has seen it all, until a particularly sadistic criminal arises on the Internet. This tech-savvy killer posts live feeds of his crimes on his website; the more hits the site gets, the faster the victim dies. Marsh and her team must find the elusive killer before time runs out.

programme.title: Apt Pupil
programme.desc: A high-school student (Brad Renfro) forms an unhealthy relationship with a former Nazi death-camp officer (Ian McKellen).

programme.title: The Grudge 2
programme.desc: A young woman (Amber Tamblyn) encounters a terrible curse while searching for her missing sister (Sarah Michelle Gellar) in Tokyo. The evil imprecation fills its victims with murderous rage, but it also brings together the diverse group to unlock its secret and save their lives.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: An ex-con takes a job truck driving across the country. However, the truck is filled with illegal weapons and now he must fight to save his family. The stakes are high as gun runners, government agents and a fleet of monstrous 18-wheelers pursue him in an intense highway duel.

programme.title: Cellular
programme.desc: Schoolteacher Jessica Martin (Kim Basinger) is abducted by ruthless crook Ethan (Jason Statham) and brought to a remote hideout, where she finds a broken cell phone. Unfortunately, when she tries to use the malfunctioning phone to contact the authorities, she accidentally reaches college student Ryan (Chris Evans) instead. The young man wants to help Jessica, but she has no idea where her captors have taken her, and Ryan must scramble to figure out where she is before his cell phone goes dead.

programme.title: Suelta la sopa

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: El teniente de policía Marion Cobretti, alias Cobra, conocido por su dureza y eficacia, tiene la misión de proteger a la testigo de un asesinato, especialmente cuando un infiltrado en el Departamento de Policía delata su escondite.

programme.title: Noticias Telemundo fin de semana
programme.desc: Los reportajes y el análisis de las noticias más importantes de Estados Unidos, América Latina y el mundo.

programme.title: Programa pagado
programme.desc: Programa que muestra diversos productos para la venta.

programme.title: Programa pagado
programme.desc: Programa que muestra diversos productos para la venta.

programme.title: Al rojo vivo
programme.desc: La revista noticiosa que define la agenda de la televisión en español en los Estados Unidos. Se caracteriza por ofrecer, antes que nadie, historias que cautivan al público hispano y por presentarlas en un formato innovador, que resalta el aspecto humano de cada noticia. El programa cuenta con un estelar equipo de reporteros, colaboradores y presentadores a lo largo y ancho del país.

programme.title: Hoy día
programme.desc: El show de las mañanas que mejor informa con las noticias más oportunas, equilibradas y relevantes que la comunidad hispana en EE. UU. necesita. Los eventos más importantes de la jornada, el entretenimiento, el pronóstico del tiempo, las recetas de cocina y los consejos para una vida sana.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: Carlos fue a la cárcel y dejó atrás a su esposa Leticia y a su pequeña hija. Tras 10 años regresó pero su hija lo rechaza por su conducta controladora.

programme.title: Caso cerrado
programme.desc: La madre de Jackeline y Néstor es cleptómana, razón por la cual han tenido muchos problemas. Ahora la señora no tiene dónde quedarse: su hija tiene niños pequeños y su hijo no soporta la convivencia con su madre.

programme.title: Decisiones
programme.desc: Apasionantes y conmovedoras historias en hechos de la vida que muestran cómo las personas resuelven situaciones a las que se ven enfrentados.

programme.title: Más sabe el diablo
programme.desc: Ángel Salvador, un joven que lleva una vida repleta de equivocaciones, comete el gran error de enamorarse de su abogada, una mujer prohibida que le propone hacer algo bueno en su vida.

programme.title: Noticias Telemundo mediodía
programme.desc: Un programa único que narra las noticias de una manera atractiva y perspicaz. Se presentan historias locales y nacionales en vivo.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Los hermanos Reyes, quienes buscan vengar la muerte de su hermana, se instalan como trabajadores en la hacienda de la familia Elizondo. El odio que sienten los hermanos pronto comienza a disiparse cuando se enamoran de las hermanas Elizondo.

programme.title: En casa con Telemundo
programme.desc: En casa con Telemundo une a las familias, ofrece entretenimiento y buenas noticias. Un show que muestra el ingenio y la creatividad durante la cuarentena. Consejos útiles y divertidos, videos de los famosos para lidiar con la crisis. Tips de salud, cocina y bienestar para enfrentar el COVID-19 de la mano de médicos y los más calificados especialistas.

programme.title: Suelta la sopa
programme.desc: Lo último que está sucediendo dentro del círculo de la farándula, es revelado en esta serie por sus presentadores extrovertidos, que no tienen ningún problema en soltar la lengua y contarlo todo, los chismes, los escándalos, son comentados de forma exhaustiva, las primicias exclusivas y las imágenes más recientes de las estrellas que están haciendo los titulares de los medios de comunicación, son divulgadas en este espacio cuyas cámaras recorren varios lugares en el territorio estadounidense y en México. Un espacio que mantiene actualizado al público y fanáticos de lo que está sucediendo con los famosos.

programme.title: El marginal III
programme.desc: Los hermanos Borges han consolidado su poder en el penal San Onofre, pero necesitan idear un plan para conseguir dinero rápido y comprar su libertad. A eso se le suma la llegada de un nuevo interno, el hijo de un empresario poderoso que los Borges deben proteger.

programme.title: Trapped in Paradise
programme.desc: Anna, una mujer que acaba de enviudar, y su hijo de 12 años, Max, se van de vacaciones a un complejo de lujo en una isla remota con la idea de descansar y recuperarse de los duros momentos vividos. Un día después de instalarse en el lugar, unos criminales asaltan el hotel y los toman como rehenes, pidiendo una cuantiosa suma de dinero a la embajada de su país.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Durante muchos años, Nathan Harper había tenido el extraño sentimiento de que la vida con su familia no era lo que parecía. Sus temores se vuelven ciertos cuando descubre una fotografía de él en un sitio de Internet de personas desaparecidas, por lo que a quienes llama papá y mamá, no son sus padres reales. Al acercarse a descubrir su identidad, Nathan se convierte en blanco de asesinos, obligándolo a huir con su vecina, Karen, la única persona en la que confía.

programme.title: Hasta que el dinero nos separe

programme.title: El color de la pasión

programme.title: Huérfanos de su tierra

programme.title: Trapped in Paradise
programme.desc: Anna, una mujer que acaba de enviudar, y su hijo de 12 años, Max, se van de vacaciones a un complejo de lujo en una isla remota con la idea de descansar y recuperarse de los duros momentos vividos. Un día después de instalarse en el lugar, unos criminales asaltan el hotel y los toman como rehenes, pidiendo una cuantiosa suma de dinero a la embajada de su país.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Durante muchos años, Nathan Harper había tenido el extraño sentimiento de que la vida con su familia no era lo que parecía. Sus temores se vuelven ciertos cuando descubre una fotografía de él en un sitio de Internet de personas desaparecidas, por lo que a quienes llama papá y mamá, no son sus padres reales. Al acercarse a descubrir su identidad, Nathan se convierte en blanco de asesinos, obligándolo a huir con su vecina, Karen, la única persona en la que confía.

programme.title: Labios rojos
programme.desc: Un hombre y su esposa enfrentan una crisis en su cama matrimonial cuando la disfunción eréctil muestra su horrible cabeza.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: En un hogar de retiro un hombre le lee a una mujer, que sufre de Alzheimer, la historia de dos jóvenes de distintas clases sociales que se enamoraron durante la convulsionada década del 40, y de cómo fueron separados por terceros, y por la guerra.

programme.desc: Don Agustín cae a un barranco. Sofía está feliz al saber que el padre Tadeo ha pedido la anulación de su matrimonio. Sofía se impresiona porque Eva estaba enamorada de su padre. Sofía entristece.

programme.title: Inseparables, amor al límite
programme.desc: Las parejas compiten en un reto de fuerza y resistencia física para evitar ir a la última prueba antes de la eliminación, en la cual las mujeres se convertirán en una garra humana para atrapar muñecos de peluche.

programme.title: Nosotros los guapos
programme.desc: Vítor y Albertano se emocionan porque participarán en el juego final de su equipo del barrio y les piden ayuda a Natacha y Cuca para entrenar, pues son muy malos jugadores.

programme.title: Nosotros los guapos
programme.desc: Nacho le regala un vestido a Cuca pero cuando confiesa que era de otra mujer ella se molesta. Albertano decide jugar en otro equipo de fútbol por culpa de Vítor.

programme.title: La Ley y el orden: Unidad de Víctimas Especiales

programme.title: Chicago P.D.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight queda involucrado en un asunto de drogas cuando su tarjeta aparece en la cartera de un miembro de una banda. Además, se hace evidente la verdadera razón de la visita del hermano de Halstead.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: El equipo trata a un paciente viudo y solitario que sufre pérdida de memoria. Al ingresar al hospital sus síntomas empeoran y el equipo considera que el consumo de drogas puede ser la causa. Cuddy planea adoptar un bebé y House critica su decisión.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: El equipo atienden a un paciente agorafóbico extrañamente enfermo que se rehúsa a salir dejar su casa y ser atendido en el hospital. El equipo debe arreglárselas para no causarle ningún otro trauma. House tiene una comezón que no puede controlar.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: El doctor Rhodes empieza con mal pie la relación con su nuevo jefe en el área de cirugía cardiotorácica. El doctor Choi comienza a ejercer de jefe de residentes. El doctor Charles aprovecha un momento de debilidad de Sarah.

programme.title: Volando A Casa
programme.desc: Colin, un adinerado hombre de negocios de Nueva York, tiene que negociar un acuerdo por una paloma en una pequeña ciudad belga. Mientras él se enamora de la hermosa nieta del dueño, él tiene que elegir si continúa con sus técnicas rudas o se somete.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Un asesino en serie con una historia de violación en serie aterroriza a Tampa, el distrito de la luz roja de Florida, dirigido a las mujeres de la noche al azar, y que escapó de la justicia durante meses hasta que deja libre a una víctima.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Asesinan a la esposa de un agente inmobiliario muy respetado y él es el principal sospechoso del crimen. La investigación revela una vida privada repleta de escándalos y un maquiavélico y homicida plan.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: Wilson aún está de luto por la muerte de su novia y renuncia al hospital Princeton Plainsboro. House busca determinar si es responsable de la muerte de la novia de su mejor amigo. Trece lucha para atender objetivamente a un paciente.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: El equipo investiga una serie de muertes relacionadas a un mismo donador de órganos, y se apresuran para salvar a los dos últimos receptores. House está más concentrado en la ausencia de Wilson y contrata a un investigador privado para espiarlo.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: House y el equipo toman el caso de un artista con una enfermedad no diagnosticada que distorsiona su percepción y condiciona toda su vida. House continúa con el investigador privado para desenterrar los secretos de la vida íntima de su equipo.

programme.title: House
programme.desc: Después de enterarse de la muerte de su padre, House es obligado a asistir al funeral. El equipo intenta diagnosticar la enfermedad de una joven adoptada que sufrió un colapso mientras estaba en China buscando a sus padres biológicos.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Después de una sorprendente introducción al nuevo recluta de Phoenix, Desi, MacGyver y su equipo son asignados para proteger a un perro que busca armas cuya cabeza tiene precio.

programme.title: La Ley y el orden: Unidad de Víctimas Especiales

programme.desc: Cuando el padre (Armand Assante) distanciado de Amaro es arrestado en su propia boda, Amaro se convierte en testigo y los secretos amenazan con dividir a su familia.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Un accidente de coche en el maratón de Chicago deja víctimas en estado crítico; April y su hermano, un médico residente, deben realizar una operación intensa en el campo; una niña de 8 años de edad, experimenta una pérdida repentina de la audición.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Una joven no sabe cómo contarles a sus padres que le han diagnosticado un cáncer. Además, la doctora Reese les pide ayuda al doctor Charles y a la detective Lindsay para lidiar con un joven problemático.

programme.title: El rey escorpión

programme.desc: Daniel y Fabiola son novios, sin embargo ella está desanimada al sentirse poco valorada por él. Así que, Ana, prima de Fabiola, le buscará un nuevo amor.

programme.title: Noticiero Univision: Edición digital
programme.desc: Noticiero que transmite los hechos mundiales relevantes para la comunidad hispana. Presentado por jóvenes periodistas en un ambiente informal.

programme.title: Nosotros los guapos
programme.desc: Albertano trabaja como maestro de yoga e inicia un romance con una atractiva y adinerada mujer madura, quien lo utiliza para vengarse de su esposo infiel.

programme.title: Hoy
programme.desc: Revista de entretenimiento y estilo de vida que presenta consejos de cocina, proyectos caseros, belleza y salud, además de noticias y artistas invitados.

programme.title: La madrastra
programme.desc: Esteban y María reciben la noticia de que Ángel podría morir. Cuando ella llega al funeral de Patricia, no imagina cómo la recibirán.

programme.title: Amor eterno
programme.desc: Zeynep le dice a Salih que no se casará con él nunca porque no lo ama. Nihan cuestiona a Zeynep sobre si está viendo a Emir. Kemal se entera de que Tarik trabaja para Emir. Zeynep le dice a Emir que Nihan sospecha de su relación.

programme.title: El gordo y la flaca
programme.desc: Chismes de celebridades y las últimas noticias de la industria del entretenimiento, en un programa que combina entrevistas con actores, músicos y celebridades.

programme.title: Primer impacto
programme.desc: Una revista que cubre las noticias de última hora y las más impactantes. Un gran equipo de periodistas ofrece completos informes del país y del mundo. El programa también cuenta con dos segmentos de salud semanales.

programme.title: Noticiero Univision: Edición digital
programme.desc: Noticiero que transmite los hechos mundiales relevantes para la comunidad hispana. Presentado por jóvenes periodistas en un ambiente informal.

programme.title: Noticiero Univisión
programme.desc: El noticiero transmite los acontecimientos mundiales que son de interés público para la comunidad hispana desde su sede en Florida e incluye reportajes de la política, el clima, los deportes, la educación, la inmigración, entre otros.

programme.title: La Rosa de Guadalupe
programme.desc: Edith le pide el divorcio a Juan, porque ya no lo ama y además, tiene un amante. Juan se suicida frente a su hija Norma, quien sufre el acoso del nuevo novio de su madre.

programme.title: Carita de ángel

programme.title: La tempestad
programme.desc: Delfina está segura que Esthercita podrá corregir sus errores recibe el permiso de Fulgencio para casarse con Damián. Olinto le cuenta a Hernán que Marina decidió supervisar las labores de pesca en La Tempestad, el barco del Capitán Fabré.

programme.title: Un gancho al corazón
programme.desc: Valentina llora porque no quiere que su madre muera. Nieves quiere averiguar si es verdad la enfermedad de Isabel. Isabel tiene un plan para que Valentina vea las fotos intimas de Estrella y Mauricio juntos para separarlos.

programme.title: Carita de ángel
programme.desc: Dulce María y Estefanía logran escapar del lugar donde estaban secuestradas. Dulce María le ofrece a Doménica y a Leonel vivir en su casa. Luciano denuncia a Omar por intento de secuestro.

programme.title: Contra viento y marea
